desc: Cooksy is the first intelligent cooking assistant. It is the closest thing you’ll have to a master chef over your shoulder. Improve your skills, impress your friends, become a foodie star, and enjoy making some fabulous food. Cooksy is cooking made easy.

layout.text: Cook your meals to perfection, every time
Cooksy monitors your pan's surface temperature from above to let you know when it's time to add, flip or stir your ingredients.
